::Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

Bloodystrike and Reptilica smile as Desmonus takes their hands, 
frowning at each other as they both realized that she was also 
holding the other.

"Yeah, sure!" Bloodystrike replies, beginning to walk down a 
hallway, "I can even show you my quarters, they're pretty nice, w-"

"Mine are better," Reptilica cuts in, also beginning to walk, the two 
bots pulling Desmonus along, "I'm higher rank so I get better 
quarters."

"You are not!" Bloodystrike suggests, glaring at Reptilica hostily. 
His eyes slide to Desmonus, a growl from Reptilica making him bare 
his teeth at his friend.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Desmonus didn't fail to notice BloodyStrikes optics traveling 
over her 
> body as she stretched, glancing over towards Reptilica and seeing 
him do the 
> same.
> But then she turnes back and sees BloodyStrike nod.
> Desmonus sees the annoyed look in BloodyStrikes face as he heard 
Reptilica 
> answer too, a small smile turning her lips.
> This could get interesting...and maybe she could get a free meal 
out of it 
> as well.
> She looked BloodyStrike over and then Reptilica. Dinner...and 
desert.
> 
> Desmonus nodds at BloodyStrikes introduction with an evil glint in 
her 
> optics, her stomach growling just as the smell of his mech-fluid 
running 
> through his veins.
> She knew that he had some sort of thing for her, even if it was 
just because 
> of her looks. But that was nothing more then she could have hoped 
for, two 
> gullable males who would believe anything that cam out of her 
mouth...and 
> maybe all she had to do was maintain a food source was keep them 
pleased.
> A small price to pay for a full stomach.
> 
> She was just about to reach out and shake BloodyStrikes hand when 
Reptilica 
> swatted his away and replaced it with his own.
> But then she simply leaned back and crossed her arms for a moment, 
watching 
> both of the bots fight over something or a nother...most likely 
her. Which 
> would serve her purpose.
> 
> Desmonus simply sighed and then stepped forward, taking hold of 
each of 
> their arms and then stepping in between them. Her voice more 
lighthearted 
> then she felt.*
> 
> " Gentlemen, please.... You two both seem like you know this base 
from bolt 
> to plating, and of course I'm new here so I don't really know my 
way around. 
> Perhaps...a tour is in order?"
